(Affects Demons and Undead [demonundead], Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This prayer will make a divine bolt strike down from the sky and deliver massive damage to a demon who fails to resist the spell.
